Package org.boothverse.foodpants.ui.controllers

Class RecipeController

java.lang.Object
org.boothverse.foodpants.ui.controllers.RecipeController
public class RecipeController extends Object
A controller which handles user events related to the recipe section

    • addRecipe

      public Recipe addRecipe(Food basis, List<FoodInstance> ingredients, String instructions, Double servings)
      Adds a new recipe to the system.
      Parameters:
      basis - the food the recipe is based on
      ingredients - a list of ingredients within the recipe
      instructions - ingredients for preparing the recipe
      servings - the number of servings the recipe produces
      Returns:
      Recipe the newly created recipe

    • produceCookedRecipe

      public void produceCookedRecipe(String recipeId, boolean isUsePantry, Double consumedServings, Double leftoverServings) throws PantsNotFoundException
      Creates a food item representing the recipe, creates a nutrition instance if some is consumed and consumes pantry items.
      Parameters:
      recipeId - the recipe id
      isUsePantry - whether to incorporate the pantry
      consumedServings - the number of servings consumed
      leftoverServings - the number of left over servings
      Throws:
      PantsNotFoundException
